xwikidoc.name: ImportPage
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
{{velocity}} #set($import = $xwiki.parseGroovyFromPage("GoogleSites.Groovy")) #set($ok = $import.init($xwiki, $xcontext, $doc)) #if($request.id) #set($nb = $import.importPage($request.site, $request.space, $request.id)) #if(!$nb || $nb == 0) {{info}} Import failed {{/info}} #else Page ${request.id} imported in [[$request.page]] #end #else No page specified #end
Debug: $import.debugStr {{/velocity}}
